-Fixed Twitter and Facebook login issue that some users encountered
-Fixed forced quit issue when entering Customer Service interface

This is an unforced update.
-Fixed Twitter and Facebook login issue that some users encountered
-Fixed forced quit issue when entering Customer Service interface

Update Note
This is a mandatory update, after which you should download and install the app again manually. Please log in and bind your account to at least one third-party account before the update if you are currently using a guest account to play the game.

Update Content
-New System Fashion Gallery
-New System Intelligence
-New System Path to Glory
